attributes.action: Introduce a returnable deposit scheme on all disposable drink containers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Country is littered with discarded cans and bottles. 100 squashed cans will fit in a couple of carrier bags and at 20p a can you have to ask yourself would you throw away £20!

Based on the experience of other countries; legislation would lift recycling rates to over 80%, reduce greenhouse gas emissions, eliminate 12 to 15% of all litter and offer councils community groups and even children a valuable new source of income as well as the habit of not throwing away litter.

Many countries now have such legislation which has resulted in much cleaner streets and countryside.
